args: (What a grotesque creature... I've never\nseen magic like this.)
(The deeper I delve, the more\nfascinating this tome becomes.)
(Deciphering it will prove quite the\nchallenge—but what fun it will be!)
(I seek, and you answer. You shall be\nthe place where I belong...)
There she goes again, off in her own\nlittle world.
And what happened to the curse?!\nWe could've handled the study if we\nknew it was just some old book!

It's always the same with her.
All nonchalant and meek, rolling
with whatever life throws her way,
and then WE end up getting hosed!
Yeah, it ain't right. Who decided SHE\ngets to have all the fun?
Not just the fun, but the glory too!\nUrgh!
The way she works, it's almost like she's\npossessed... Wait.
Oh ho ho, I just had a great idea.
You want me to stop researching\nthe grimoire? But why?!
I've received some disturbing reports\nsince you began your work with it.\nThat you've become ＂a woman possessed.＂
And considering the nature of that book...\nYou're too valuable to this academy;\nI believe it best that you take a break.
I appreciate that, sir, but I assure you I'm\nfine. Furthermore, I couldn't possibly\nstop my research midstream.
Oh, you needn't worry about that.\nOthers will be carrying on in your\nstead.
These two volunteered after expressing\nconcern for your well-being.
You are not even aware of your own\naltered state. Take some time to \nrecover. Understood?
Ha ha ha! Did you see her face?!
Serves her right. She'll think twice about\nmaking fools of us now!
Exactly. We just have to unlock the secrets\nof this grimoire while she's out.
And once we do, the credit will be ALL\nours! Ba ha ha!
Er... Did you hear something just now?
(I wanted to know more. I wanted to be\nbrought somewhere entirely new.)
(That feeling of reverie... It was a\ncompletely new sensation. I wanted\nto feel it more, but... But...)
...But it's done. There is nothing I can do.
